welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Buli, the charming city in the Philippines known for its stunning beaches, rich culture, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern terminal dedicated to Philippine Airlines and its partner airlines for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A small terminal serving only domestic flights for local carriers.

wifi.note: WiFi access is limited to 1 hour per device. Additional time can be purchased for a fee.
